column4: how do I get gcc working with ubuntu, i tried to compile a program and got these errors http://rafb.net/p/07mfA449.html
you installed only gcc?  you should install build-essential, it brings in the generic headers
when you do that it asks for the ubuntu cd which i don't have any more
system->admin->software sources , enable the first four and disable the cdrom. You can get it from the net
